box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 使用具有 cluster_manager 角色的自定义用户登录

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 128px; height: 1px; padding-top: 74px; margin-left: 487px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 创建一个新的TiDB 集群

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 131px; height: 1px; padding-top: 74px; margin-left: 647px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 向该集群中添加一定数量的数据（100G），并运行一定的工作负载（TPCC）

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 148px; height: 1px; padding-top: 74px; margin-left: 807px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 查看对应的集群是否出现在 工作负载和数据规模 top3 集群里面

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 218px; height: 1px; padding-top: 69px; margin-left: 1002px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 进入该集群的诊断指标页面，并查看QPS 是否大于100 和 active session 是否大于50

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 188px; height: 1px; padding-top: 169px; margin-left: 1017px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 进入该集群的性能诊断页面

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 251px; height: 1px; padding-top: 254px; margin-left: 1017px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
